title: Camera lens font
content:
Hi  
Can anyone help me identlfy the font used on this camera lens please?  
Many thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Camera font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150319050901/http:/typophile.com/files/Camera%20font.jpg) | 248.31 KB |
author: littlejen74

comments.content:
Assuming this comes from a Leica lens and according to this [post](http://web.archive.org/web/20150319050901/http:/www.l-camera-forum.com/leica-forum/customer-forum/46666-whats-font-name-used-leica.html#post497098), font should be 'LG 1045/1050', proprietary and exclusive to Leica.  
Alternatives: [Vox Round](http://web.archive.org/web/20150319050901/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/vox-round) (and mixing it with [Sol](http://web.archive.org/web/20150319050901/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/sol-pro) could work), [Basic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150319050901/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fwww.fontshop.com/families/basic), [Zolan](http://web.archive.org/web/20150319050901/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/btn/zolan-mono-btn) (Mono)

Can't find an exact match either. Take into account that this is probably a custom OEM font of the lens manufacturer designed for the lens production machine and not a commercially available digital font.  
You may like one of the following replacement candidates, here is a square looking one:  
 **[Thud (Medium)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150319050901/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Suomi%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Thud%20-%20Medium&fid=3f6e746c92f5fae0c339a0d953677eda&fsize=60&text=DC%20ELMARIT%201%3A2.8%2F10.2%20ASPH&wrap=2)** by Suomi Type Foundry [2010]  
...and some more round ones:  
 **[Zetta Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150319050901/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=PlayType%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Zetta%20Sans%20-%20Regular&fid=705f45f9b8eb0dbbe506d35e98219f42&fsize=60&text=DC%20ELMARIT%201%3A2.8%2F10.2%20ASPH&wrap=2)** by Jonas Hecksher [PlayType]  
 **[Coda](http://web.archive.org/web/20150319050901/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Google-Web-Fonts%20%2F%20%28Freemium%29&ffam=Coda%20-%20Regular&fid=fc5514afc8b9a2cc39776e68b28b39d7&fsize=60&text=DC%20ELMARIT%201%3A2.8%2F10.2%20ASPH&wrap=2)** by Vernon Adams [Google Web Fonts, 2010]  
 **[Eurostile Medium](http://web.archive.org/web/20150319050901/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=URW%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=EurostileTMed%20-%20Regular&fid=562e0f2e786533bc0ea0cd8189456961&fsize=60&text=DC%20ELMARIT%201%3A2.8%2F10.2%20ASPH&wrap=2)**

PS: I now see that Ryuk confirmed it's a custom font...

I had a feeling that might be the case.  
Thud, Basic and Eurostile were the closest I could find.  
Many thanks for your efforts.
